thread.section_title: Figo Pet Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Figo Pet Insurance | figopetinsurance.com
thread.title: Julie Dunks
thread.title_full: Figo Pet Insurance reviewed by Julie Dunks

author: Julie Dunks
title: Julie Dunks
text: Our vet recommended purchasing pet insurance for our Newfoundland puppy Togiak. As a first-time pet insurance shopper, I chose Figo because of the user-friendly format, straight forward plans to choose from, & easily understood verbiage. The initial purchasing experience was very simple & seemed to offer competitive fees. When the time came to file a claim, that too was extremely easy & efficient. Photos of receipts & invoices for care were easily uploaded along with the claim. Samantha Hall responded to all my email questions very quickly. We received our reimbursement check in a timely matter - about 2 weeks later! Figo Pet Insurance is a pleasure to work with, and I HIGHLY recommend this company!
